html: She had defaulted on a loan, and an assassin was planning to stake out her delivery and kill her when she left the hospital.

html: I met a woman named Andrea who fled Guatemala when she was 8 months pregnant.

html: This is disgraceful. #KeepFamiliesTogether

html: She hasn’t seen her daughter in two days and didn’t know where she was. No one had told her that her daughter had been taken to a shelter.
text: She hasn’t seen her daughter in two days and didn’t know where she was. No one had told her that her daughter had been taken to a shelter.

html: And I met a woman named Reina who was being extorted in Guatemala. She traveled 14 days with her 13 year old daughter and turned herself in at the border for asylum.
